text.emotional: [surprise, low]Then, this young woman in her fancy, sapphire-blue merino sweater - who we thought was just shy - just held up some paper in the air.[/surprise]
text.silence: {.} then {....} this young woman {....} in her fancy sapphire blue merino sweater {...} who we thought was {...} just shy {....} just held up some paper in the air {...}
